The package ozdata allows seaching and retrieving data from `http://data.gov.au/` and `http://ausmacrodata.org/`.

##Installation
```
install.packages("ozdata")
library(ozdata)
```
Development version from GitHub
```
if (!require(devtools))
  install.packages(devtools)
devtools::install_github("AU-BUGRr/ozdata")
```

##Usage
###download_shape()
download_shape function returns sf objects.

###download_oz_metadata()

###get_ausmacrodata()
The `ausmacrodata.org` contains macroeconomic data from the ABS and RBA. Every ausmacrodata series have unique ID and can be loaded either by using full URL or only series ID. The first argument is either full URL or ID. The subsequent argument specifies in what format data should be returned: `tibble`, `ts` or `xts`, whereas `ts` is a default format for quaterly data and `xts` for daily data.

```
# Load the job vacancies data in New South Wales between 1983-2017
# 'jvnswjvstoq' is a unique ID of this series
dat <- get_ausmacrodata('jvnswjvstoq')

#plot the seris
library(xts)
plot(dat)
```
